name: Classic Google+ Layout (For New G+) [1080p Only]
description: This theme is currently only compatible with 1080p screens. You also need browser zoom set to 80% (this tricks G+ into enabling 3 columns, currently only tested on Google Chrome). I hope to one day get this fully dynamic on all screens. This style was created by myself to emulate the old feel of Google+ Communities as inevitably Google will remove 'Classic Google+' and force us to use 'New Google+' without really addressing any of our concerns :) I hope you find use out of it. Would love to hear any feedback or suggestions.
